forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am, then isolated showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 70, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. Southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
